data.name: Sample - Netscout AED - 1.1.0
data.description: Netscout Arbor Edge Defense (AED) secures the internet data center edge from threats against availability — specifically from application-layer, distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.

workflows.description: Retrieves the Netscout AED country codes and names based on the country names and other filter criteria you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Countries

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Countries

workflows.description: Creates an Netscout AED protection group based on the protection group name, IP addresses, protection group server type, and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Create Inbound Protection Groups

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Create Inbound Protection Groups

workflows.description: Retrieves all the inbound protection groups or specific inbound protection groups from the Netscout AED protection groups based on the protection group identifier, name, and other filter criteria you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Inbound Protection Groups

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Inbound Protection Groups

workflows.description: Modifies the mode or the protection level for specific inbound protection groups based on the protection group IDs you have specified.
workflows.name: Update Inbound Protection Groups

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Update Inbound Protection Groups

workflows.description: Adds one or more countries to the Netscout AED blocked-list based on the country codes and protection group IDs (PGID) or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Inbound Blacklist Countries

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Add Inbound Blacklist Countries

workflows.description: Retrieves all the inbound blocked-list countries or specific inbound blocked-list countries based on the country codes, protection group IDs, central configuration IDs, or other filter criteria you have specified. By default, 10 blocked-list countries are returned. An ID of -1 selects countries that are in the global blocked-list.
workflows.name: Get Inbound Blacklisted Countries

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Inbound Blacklisted Countries

workflows.description: Removes one or more countries from the Netscout AED blocked-list for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the country codes, protection group IDs, central configuration IDs, or other filter criteria you have specified.
workflows.name: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Countries

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Countries

workflows.description: Adds one or more domains to the Netscout AED blocked-list based on the domain names, protection group IDs (PGID), or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Inbound Blacklist Domains

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Add Inbound Blacklist Domains

workflows.description: Retrieves all the inbound blocked-list domains or specific inbound blocked-list domains based on the domain names, protection group IDs, central configuration IDs, or other filter criteria you have specified. An ID of -1 selects domains that are in the global blocked-list.
workflows.name: Get Inbound Blacklisted Domains

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Inbound Blacklisted Domains

workflows.description: Removes one or more domains from the Netscout AED blocked-list for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the domain names, protection group IDs, or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.
workflows.name: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Domains

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Domains

workflows.description: Adds one or more hosts to the Netscout AED blocked-list based on the host addresses, protection group IDs (PGID), or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Inbound Blacklist Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Add Inbound Blacklist Hosts

workflows.description: Retrieves all the inbound blocked-list hosts or specific inbound blocked-list hosts based on the host addresses, protection group IDs (PGID), central configuration IDs (CID), or other filter criteria you have specified. An ID of -1 selects domains that are in the global blocked-list.
workflows.name: Get Inbound Blacklisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Inbound Blacklisted Hosts

workflows.description: Removes one or more hosts or CIDRs from the Netscout AED blocked-list for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the host addresses, protection group IDs (PGID), or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.
workflows.name: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Hosts

workflows.description: Adds one or more hosts to the Netscout AED allowed-list based on the host addresses, protection group IDs (PGID), or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Inbound Whitelisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Add Inbound Whitelisted Hosts

workflows.description: Retrieves all the inbound allowed-list hosts or specific inbound allowed-list hosts based on the host addresses, protection group IDs (PGID), central configuration IDs (CID), or other filter criteria you have specified. An ID of -1 selects domains that are in the global allowed-list.
workflows.name: Get Inbound Whitelisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Inbound Whitelisted Hosts

workflows.description: Removes one or more hosts or CIDRs from the Netscout AED allowed-list for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the host addresses, protection group IDs (PGID), central configuration IDs (CID), or other filter criteria you have specified. An ID of -1 selects domains that are in the global allowed-list.
workflows.name: Remove Inbound Whitelisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Remove Inbound Whitelisted Hosts

workflows.description: Adds one or more URLs to the Netscout AED blocked-list based on the URL and protection group IDs (PGID) or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Inbound Blacklist URLs

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Add Inbound Blacklist URLs

workflows.description: Retrieves all the inbound blocked-list URLs or specific inbound blocked-list URLs based on the host addresses, protection group IDs (PGID), central configuration IDs (CID), or other filter criteria you have specified. An ID of -1 selects domains that are in the global blocked-list.
workflows.name: Get Inbound Blacklisted URLs

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Inbound Blacklisted URLs

workflows.description: Removes one or more URLs from the Netscout AED blocked-list for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the URLs and protection group IDs (PGID) or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.
workflows.name: Remove Inbound Blacklisted URLs

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Remove Inbound Blacklisted URLs

workflows.description: Adds one or more hosts to the Netscout AED outbound blocked-list based on the host addresses or CIDRs you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Outbound Blacklist Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Add Outbound Blacklist Hosts

workflows.description: Retrieves all the outbound blocked-list hosts or specific outbound blocked-list hosts based on the host addresses, or other filter criteria you have specified. An ID of -1 selects domains that are in the global blocked-list.
workflows.name: Get Outbound Blacklisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Outbound Blacklisted Hosts

workflows.description: Removes one or more hosts or CIDRs from the Netscout AED outbound blocked-list based on the host addresses or CIDRs you have specified.
workflows.name: Remove Outbound Blacklisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Remove Outbound Blacklisted Hosts

workflows.description: Adds one or more hosts to the Netscout AED outbound allowed-list based on the host addresses or CIDRs you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Outbound Whitelist Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Add Outbound Whitelist Hosts

workflows.description: Retrieves all the outbound allowed-list hosts or specific outbound allowed-list hosts based on the host addresses, or other filter criteria you have specified. An ID of -1 selects domains that are in the global allowed-list.
workflows.name: Get Outbound Whitelisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Get Outbound Whitelisted Hosts

workflows.description: Removes one or more hosts or CIDRs from the Netscout AED outbound allowed-list based on the host addresses or CIDRs you have specified.
workflows.name: Remove Outbound Whitelisted Hosts

arguments.title: Netscout AED: Remove Outbound Whitelisted Hosts

workflows.description: Sends an API request to any API endpoint based on specified HTTP method, endpoint, and other input parameters that you have specified, enabling flexible API interactions tailored to user needs.
workflows.name: Execute an API Call
